channel.title: Production Expansion on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Production Expansion on FinanClub

item.title: FSR
item.description: score:63 Chances: Fisker plans to significantly increase EV production in the fourth quarter, which could lead to higher revenues. Fisker is expanding its presence in Europe, opening up new markets and increasing its global reach. Fisker’s innovative and affordable electric vehicle, the Fisker Pear, is generating interest with its competitive pricing.
